document_data.name: ''Dice of Chancelessness''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Dice of chancelessness''''' were an [[enchanted]] set of [[dice]] carried by a follower of [[Mask]] from [[Skuld]] named [[Huriot]].
document_data.Powers: These dice would roll any number the owner desired. If the owner let another person roll the ''dice of chancelessless'' then they would still roll whatever number the original owner wanted.
